HELP WITH ADVANCED COMBOS FOR XBOX

ADVANCED IN GAME CONTROLS (ARCADES)

ID Combo Description
A Back + White Pause Game and Remap Controller or Cheat
B Back + Black Show Framerate And Free Memory
C Back +  Left Trigger + Right Trigger Restart Game
D Back + Right Thumb Button Onscreen Display
E Back + Right Trigger + Right Thumb Button Load Game (Buggy)
F Back +  Left Trigger + Right Thumb Button Save Game (Buggy)
G Back + Left Thumb Button Lightgun Crosshair Display
H Back + A  + B  Take In Game Snapshot

ADVANCED IN GAME CONTROLS (CONSOLES & FINAL BURN)

ID Combo Description
A Back + White Save State (Consoles Only)
B Back + Black Load State (Consoles Only)
I Back + Black + B Close Virtual Keyboard (Some Consoles Only)
